ActorBase ActorBase Class

In this Article

Edit

Represents base class for actors.

Syntax

Declaration

public abstract class ActorBasePublic MustInherit Class ActorBase

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
    Object
  • ActorBase
    ActorBase

Inherited Members

Remarks

This is a base type for actor, it provides the functionality that is common across actors implemented by actor deriving from Actor The state is preserved across actor garbage collections and fail-overs. The storage and retrieval of the state is provided by the actor state provider IActorStateProvider.

Properties summary

ActorService
ActorService

Gets the stateful service replica that is hosting the actor.
ApplicationName
ApplicationName

Gets the name of the application that contains the actor service that is hosting this actor.
Id
Id

Gets the identity of this actor with the actor service.
ServiceUri
ServiceUri

Gets the Uri of the actor service that is hosting this actor.

Gets the event for the specified event interface.
GetReminder(String)
GetReminder(String)

Gets the actor reminder with specified reminder name.
OnActivateAsync()
OnActivateAsync()

Override this method to initialize the members, initialize state or register timers. This method is called right after the actor is activated and before any method call or reminders are dispatched on it.
OnDeactivateAsync()
OnDeactivateAsync()

Override this method to release any resources. This method is called when actor is deactivated (garbage collected by Actor Runtime). Actor operations like state changes should not be called from this method.
OnPostActorMethodAsync(ActorMethodContext)
OnPostActorMethodAsync(ActorMethodContext)

This method is invoked by actor runtime an actor method has finished execution. Override this method for performing any actions after an actor method has finished execution.

OnPreActorMethodAsync(ActorMethodContext)
OnPreActorMethodAsync(ActorMethodContext)

This method is invoked by actor runtime just before invoking an actor method. Override this method for performing any actions prior to an actor method is invoked.
RegisterReminderAsync(String, Byte[], TimeSpan, TimeSpan)
RegisterReminderAsync(String, Byte(), TimeSpan, TimeSpan)

Registers the specified reminder with actor.

Registers a Timer for the actor.
UnregisterReminderAsync(IActorReminder)
UnregisterReminderAsync(IActorReminder)

Unregisters the specified reminder with actor.
UnregisterTimer(IActorTimer)
UnregisterTimer(IActorTimer)

Unregisters a Timer previously set on this actor.

    OnPostActorMethodAsync(ActorMethodContext)
    OnPostActorMethodAsync(ActorMethodContext)

    This method is invoked by actor runtime an actor method has finished execution. Override this method for performing any actions after an actor method has finished execution. 

    protected virtual Task OnPostActorMethodAsync(ActorMethodContext actorMethodContext)Protected Overridable Function OnPostActorMethodAsync(actorMethodContext As ActorMethodContext) As Task

    Parameters

    • actorMethodContext
      ActorMethodContext
      ActorMethodContext

      An ActorMethodContext describing the method that was invoked by actor runtime prior to this method.

    Returns

    • Task
      Task

      A Task representing post-actor-method operation.

    Remarks

    This method is invoked by actor runtime prior to:

    • Invoking an actor interface method when a client request comes.
    • Invoking a method on IRemindable interface when a reminder fires.
    • Invoking a timer callback when timer fires.
  • Edit

    Parameters

    • actorMethodContext
      ActorMethodContext
      ActorMethodContext

      An ActorMethodContext describing the method that will be invoked by actor runtime after this method finishes.

    Returns

    • Task
      Task

      A Task representing pre-actor-method operation.

    Remarks

    This method is invoked by actor runtime prior to:

    • Invoking an actor interface method when a client request comes.
    • Invoking a method on IRemindable interface when a reminder fires.
    • Invoking a timer callback when timer fires.
  • Edit
    RegisterReminderAsync(String, Byte[], TimeSpan, TimeSpan)
    RegisterReminderAsync(String, Byte(), TimeSpan, TimeSpan)

    Registers the specified reminder with actor.

    protected Task<IActorReminder> RegisterReminderAsync(string reminderName, byte[] state, TimeSpan dueTime, TimeSpan period)Protected Function RegisterReminderAsync(reminderName As String, state As Byte(), dueTime As TimeSpan, period As TimeSpan) As Task(Of IActorReminder)

    Parameters

    • reminderName
      String
      String

      Name of the reminder to register.

    • state
      Byte[]
      Byte()

      State associated with reminder.

    • dueTime
      TimeSpan
      TimeSpan

      A TimeSpan representing the amount of time to delay before firing the reminder. Specify negative one (-1) milliseconds to prevent reminder from firing. Specify zero (0) to fire the reminder immediately.

    • period
      TimeSpan
      TimeSpan

      The time interval between firing of reminders. Specify negative one (-1) milliseconds to disable periodic firing.

    Returns

    • Task<IActorReminder>
      Task(Of IActorReminder)

      A task that represents the asynchronous registration operation. The value of TResult parameter is an IActorReminder that represents the actor reminder that was registered.

  • Edit

    RegisterTimer(Func(Of Object, Task), Object, TimeSpan, TimeSpan)

    protected IActorTimer RegisterTimer(Func<object, Task> asyncCallback, object state, TimeSpan dueTime, TimeSpan period)Protected Function RegisterTimer(asyncCallback As Func(Of Object, Task), state As Object, dueTime As TimeSpan, period As TimeSpan) As IActorTimer

    Parameters

    • asyncCallback
      Func<Object, Task>
      Func(Of Object, Task)

      Callback to invoke when timer fires.

    • state
      Object
      Object

      State to pass into timer callback.

    • dueTime
      TimeSpan
      TimeSpan

      TimeSpan when actor timer is first due.

    • period
      TimeSpan
      TimeSpan

      TimeSpan for subsequent actor timer invocation.

    Returns

    • IActorTimer
      IActorTimer

      Returns IActorTimer object.

      When the specified reminder is not registered with actor.
